company_legal_names: tcg process limited | tcg process gmbh
short_description: tcg process is a software development services company based in baar, switzerland.
long_description: the intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers. at tcg process, we value our promise to customers, partners and employees to create and provide support for the best enterprise process automation solution. our global team of employees is here to work with you in the regions around the world, and have 12 subsidiaries across europe, americas and asia pacific. tcg process's customers and partners gain from our commitment to provide a team of employees on each continent. the international development organization, with its core team switzerland, along with technical specialists in each subsidiary are ready to fully onboard and support customers and partners with a process-oriented focus. creating a global team to be close to our customers and partners is in our dna. we formed the company in switzerland with a working knowledge of both technology and processes. tcg process then expanded to germany, chile, brazil, and poland before entering markets in the us, canada, australia, portugal, japan and italy.
generated_description: tcg process is a company based in baar, zug, specializing in intelligent document processing and business process automation solutions. the company provides end-to-end orchestration, leveraging ai and intelligent document processing technologies to automate workflows and optimize operations. tcg process serves various industries, including banking, insurance, healthcare, and government. the company operates globally with subsidiaries in multiple countries across europe, the americas, and asia pacific, offering a range of products such as docprostar and email triage. tcg process is committed to delivering value through its dedicated and experienced team, focusing on enhancing productivity, agility, and efficiency for its customers.
